aas:langStringTextType.aas:text: The RecyclingBatch aspect model defines a standardized and interoperable representation containing information about involved actors, process steps, and batch-specific details such as identifiers and container-related properties, in a consistent and machine-readable manner.
List of child process steps performed on the recycling batch.
List of child process steps performed on the recycling batch.

The RecyclingBatch aspect model defines a standardized and interoperable representation containing information about involved actors, process steps, and batch-specific details such as identifiers and container-related properties, in a consistent and machine-readable manner.

aas:langStringDefinitionTypeIec61360.aas:text: The RecyclingBatch aspect model defines a standardized and interoperable representation containing information about involved actors, process steps, and batch-specific details such as identifiers and container-related properties, in a consistent and machine-readable manner.
Identifier of the recycling batch.
Empty weight of the container based on the scale display
Volume of the container type according to AVAL
Standardized description of the container type according to AVAL.
Standardized number for the container type which contains compositions / components / materials according to AVAL
Properties of a container.
Start of the specific process step.
End of the specific process step.
Incoming net weight in the specific process step.
Outgoing net weight of the specific process step.
Measuring instrument for material share/weight determination.
timestamp of the specific time of measurement.
Weight of loss within the specific childProcessStep.
Official document that records the result of weighing (of composition / components / materials) on a scale.
Specification of loss within the specific process step.
Type of child process.
List of child process steps performed on the recycling batch.
Process that is used to handle waste according to the choosen strategy.
Materials that have undergone mechanical recycling (true or false).
Materials that have undergone chemical recycling (true or false).
The process reflects the current processing phase in the reverse chain of a vehicle, its composition, components, and materials.
Single Entity of process information.
Operating number of the actor.
Type of the actor in the recycling process.
Property based on a BPNS.
Receiver of the RecyclingBatch.
Sender of the RecyclingBatch.
Identifier for the transport of compositions / components / materials between two actors.
Operator of the transport process.
The fully anonymous ID in the dataspace of the part.
